mapper.insert: INSERT INTO brand (brand_name, brand_phone, brand_account, brand_bank, product_code) VALUES (#{brandName}, #{brandPhone}, #{brandAccount}, #{brandBank}, #{productCode});
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM brand
ORDER BY brand_code

SELECT b.brand_name, b.brand_phone, b.brand_account, b.brand_bank, b.product_code FROM brand b JOIN product_name pn ON pn.product_code = b.product_code WHERE b.brand_code = #{brandCode} ORDER BY b.brand_code
